price: (Ẹ rántí) nígbà tí A ṣe àdéhùn ogójì òru fún (Ànábì) Mūsā. Lẹ́yìn náà, ẹ tún bọ ọ̀bọrọgidi ọmọ màálù lẹ́yìn rẹ̀. Alábòsí sì ni yín.
arabic: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh wāʿadnā mūsā arbaʿīna laylatan thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
